content: It's important to recognize that everyone is entitled to their own priorities and focus on their own lives. However, it's worth noting that a lack of attention to the issues of cybersecurity affects us all. Cybersecurity is everyone's concern because the internet and our personal information are intertwined with our daily lives. Cyber attacks can spread widely and affect countless people, including friends, family, and colleagues, causing immeasurable harm. We may all be affected by cyber attacks, either through direct or indirect harm, so it’s common ground that we should all be protecting ourselves to some level.
